overview:
Joe Collins brings 26 years of contact lens manufacturing experience to the SynergEyesÂ® team, including roles as the first Process Engineer for the premium CSI contact lens brand, project leader on successful manufacturing automation systems at WJ, and engineering management at Syntex Ophthalmics, Sola and Pilkington Barnes Hind and Wesley Jessen.

As a respected industry veteran Joe has provided consulting for Allergan Inc, and Addition Technology, Inc. Joe’s experience in process engineering, advanced automation systems, lens design and manufacturing equip him with the skills necessary to manage the complex operations for the production of the premium SynergEyesÂ® products.
